newsitem.title: USA: USCI unit partners with Metrocall.
newsitem.headline: USCI unit partners with Metrocall.

text.p: USCI Inc said on Tuesday its wholly-owned subsidiary, U.S. Paging Services Inc, made an agreement with Metrocall Inc to use a single frequency paging channel and become a non-facilities-based paging service provider to distibutors, including certain Staples Inc stores.
The company also said another unit, U.S. Communications Inc, would provide the processing and activations for cellular telephones sold in Metrocall's own retail stores.
The company did not disclose further details of the deal.
